summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Knowledge Base Chatbot functionality. All core features working correctly including chat interface, AI responses, and suggested topics sidebar.
passed_tests: Knowledge Base page navigation via sidebar
Chat interface rendering with input field and suggested topics
Aspirin query response with correct formula (C9H8O4)
Ethanol query response with correct formula (C2H5OH)
Suggested topics sidebar presence and visibility
Real-time chat messaging and bot responses
Proper error handling for unknown queries
